overview:
Philipp is a disruptive marketer, creative think tank, and social media leader. He brings over seven years of online marketing and brand strategy experience and has worked both agency and client side. He has worked with top brands such as Vancity, Celebration of Light, Mogo, Cactus Club, Westport, Blast Radius and Electronic Arts.

In that time Philipp has had several case studies published showcasing his achievements in conversion optimization, online community building and lead generation. His online community work was also recognized with a Shorty Awards nomination and by Guy Kawasaki’s Alltop blog.

Philipp devotes his free time to the BC Children’s Hospital Foundation where he sits on the social media advisory committee, founded Grind For Kids and was co-chair for British Columbia’s largest one-day fundraiser, Jeans Day.
